item.title: hmdrmd: R Markdown templates for data analysis
item.author: hayden.macdonald.8778@gmail.com (Hayden MacDonald)
item.description: R Markdown R Markdown1 is a powerful R package that allows users to dynamically render their work (code, graphs, and text) into various file formats. Its wide range of output formats (including HTML, PDF, Word) makes it the most powerful and intuitive communication tool within the R community. Ultimately, R Markdown bridges the gap between data professionals and the audience they need to communicate to. In fact, I’m communicating to you right now through an R Markdown document rendered to HTML.
